reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of GREK 102, GREK 100.
Note: students who have received credit for GREK 200 (or its equivalent at another post-secondary institution) may not receive credit also for GREK 201 or 202.
This class will be held in the CNERS Seminar Room - Buchanan C203
description: Completion of the grammatical foundations of Ancient Greek, Part I.
